sim.author: Yurik V. Nikiforoff aka Yurik_nsk
Yemelianov A.V. aka Dust (www.airwar.ru/other/3m.html) - new 3D model

help.title: An-2 v2.0
help.line: Preferred Takeoff: nominal, manifold pressure 900 mmHg, rotate at 110 km/h
Extremal takeoff: flaps to 20', full throttle up to 5 min
Climbout: no flaps, pressure 900 mmHg, 140 km/h
Cruise: pressure 615-745 mmHg, speed up to 225 km/h

item.name: Cylinder Head and Oil Temperature Indicator
Manual crank to turn the engine to distribute oil
Reduce throttle until generator switches off
Adjust engine RPM until generator switches on again
Adjust engine RPM with propeller pitch
